name: Flappy Boy (Kozali)
description:
Hi,first of all sorry for my bad english i'm french so this jam is my first jam and I started to use Unity for about 2-3 weeks ago, I know my game is ugly(bad) but i'm very happy that i finish my idea(not my but the flappy bird creator) before the game jam finished so please enjoy :)

For playing just press left click or Space button !
